actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to disapprove the submission of the needs analysis for student assistance transmitted to the Congress on October 13, 1981, expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the family contribution schedule.

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed needs analysis formula transmitted to the Congress on October 13, 1981, for specified forms of student aid under the Higher Education Act of 1965. Expresses the sense of the Senate that, in addition to conditions applied to Pell Grants pursuant to a specified joint resolution, the family contribution schedule for 1981-1982 be retained for the 1982-1983 academic year, with specified exceptions.

titles.title: A resolution to disapprove the submission of the needs analysis for student assistance transmitted to the Congress on October 13, 1981, expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the family contribution schedule.
